nodes.text: The Interceptor-class frigate was a light capital ship used primarily by pirate organizations.

The Interceptor frigate was a fast and maneuverable ship and had heavy armor and powerful shielding. Despite the frigate being equipped with some turbolasers and proton torpedo launchers, it was lightly armed for its size.

Though they were used by a large number of pirate groups during the Galactic Civil War, including Black Sun. Tyber Zann had a large amount of these ships modified to be faster and less armored to become Interceptor IV frigates.
